attributes.title: Office Refrigerator Prank
attributes.caption: A very serious meeting is happening, so we bring them the whole refrigerator to keep everyone hydrated!

attributes.title: Things You Shouldn't Do With a Bounce Castle - Between the Games
attributes.caption: We head back to the old Achievement Hunter office, but almost everything's gone! At least that leaves plenty of room to inflate a giant bounce castle.

attributes.title: Racing Go Karts in The New Studio
attributes.caption: The gang gives a tour of their new studio, but with Go-Karts!
attributes.description: The gang gives a tour of their new studio, but with Go-Karts!
attributes.display_title: Racing Go Karts in The New Studio

attributes.title: Opening Pokémon Booster Boxes from Evolving Skies
attributes.caption: Jeremy and Alfredo open Pokémon cards in a pack battle to see who can get the rarest cards.
attributes.description: Jeremy and Alfredo open Pokémon cards from booster packs to see who can get the rarest cards. How it works: there are 36 packs, and they open 12 packs per round. Each pack has a reverse holographic card, if it is rare, it’s 1 point. Holographic rare cards are worth 2 points. “V-cards” are worth 3 points, full-art cards are worth 4 points, secret rare cards are 5 points, and there are two cards with 10 points. This stream originally aired on September 15, 2021.
attributes.display_title: Opening Pokémon Booster Boxes from Evolving Skies

attributes.title: How Fast Can You Spin On a Hoverboard?

attributes.title: How We Broke The Ceiling
attributes.caption: Can our office survive a game of keepie uppie with an exercise ball? Guess we'll find out!
attributes.description: Can our office survive a game of keepie uppie with an exercise ball? Guess we'll find out!

attributes.title: Moonie Dodgie Doo!
attributes.caption: Happy Holidays! We're playing some classic moonball with a twist! You can only move while on a hoverboard, and the new AH Holiday Clothes are Moon Ball proof!
